name: Farm
uniques: Grants [Tetanus] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
[+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Civil Service]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

name: City center
uniques: Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+2 Food, +1 Production]
Grants [Plague] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [2]% chance> <before the [Atomic era]>
Grants [Covid] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [1]% chance> <after the [Informaton era]>
Grants [Tetanus] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [2]% chance> <before the [Modern era]>
Grants [Obesity] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [4]% chance> <after the [Atomic era]>
Grants [HIV] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Grants [Syphilis] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>
Grants [Flu] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [1]% chance>
Grants [Autism] to adjacent units for the rest of the game <with [3]% chance>

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization
